values: The holiday cheer in Hogsmeade never fails to be completely vile.

A Hogsmeade trip. How thrilling.

Or it would be, if the town wasn't so digustingly cheerful. Despite the threat of the Death Eaters

[PRIVATE: Malfoy, the younger]

So, really, what have you been up to?

[/PRIVATE]

[private] I found an address. Perhaps I should send an owl soon... [/private] Such lovely professors we have. We're so lucky to be graced with their talent. ((OOC: if anyone wants to do a thread with Blaise, let me know! ♥))

Is it only my imagination, or does Malfoy's name seem to appear with more frequency as of late? How disappointing. [Private] I found a familiar name in the Prophet several days ago, but there's been nothing else. I've searched every news outlet to which I have access. It's such a trivial matter, really. I don't know why I'm so worked up. They're all the same, Mother's ex boyfriends and dead husbands. Except for this one. He could have been a real father figure. I am such a sap. [/Private] Does anything interesting ever happen in this place?

[PRIVATE]

It should be illegal for females to travel the corridors alone. It gets me into far too much trouble.

Bloody brainless bints.

[/PRIVATE]

Has anyone an idea as to when Professor Slughorn is hosting the next Slug Club function? I seemed to have lost misplaced his letter.
<center>This is the journal of Blaise Zabini for <lj comm=wizards_chess> RPG.
